name: Predaplant Heliamphorhynchus
text: If your opponent controls a monster with a Predator Counter: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by your opponent's card: You can target 1 DARK Dragon or 1 DARK Plant monster in your GY, except "Predaplant Heliamphorhynchus"; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Predaplant Heliamphorhynchus" once per turn.
